alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 3:21AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 11 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions are possible for a period on Saturday. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern New London and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
